pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Companion to the e-Book "YaRrr!: The Pirate's Guide to R" // Contains a mixture of functions and data sets referred to in the introductory e-book "YaRrr!: The Pirate's Guide to R". The latest version of the e-book is available for free at https://www.thepiratesguidetor.com.
